reviewText:
I read all the great reviews about the this DVD and am glad it has helped so many bougainvillea growers. I am a totally 'newbie' when it comes to plants and especially bougainvillea but so much of what I DO know about bougainvilleas was in this DVD. For someone who doesn't want to or doesn't have the time to do research online this DVD is clear and succinct when it comes to basic information on bougainvilleas.

I thought this DVD would go more in depth when it comes to 'troubleshooting' growing bougainvilleas. I really, really wanted to love this DVD but I didn't get much information that I didn't already know.
